slide-1.title: Enjoy Cashback up to Rp700.000
slide-1.subtitle: Special discount on celebrating Indonesian independence day. Only for you! Valid from August 17 until August 31.

bespoke-service-section.title: Bespoke Suit Service
bespoke-service-section.subtitle: We measure and make suit patterns from scratch and just for you. Each suit pattern and structure is made exclusively and is different for each individual, producing a suit size that fits your body so you can look more optimally and confidently. The price we offer includes a suit, pants, and fabric.

card-1.description: Hi-Twist material is formed from polyester fibers that have a coarse texture, tend to be thinner and more flexible.

card-2.description: Blends of Wool with other materials such as Cashmere, Polyester, Silk, and others. The thickness varies in each type.

card-3.description: This material contains more than 90% Wool, are relatively thicker than other materials and have a coarse texture.
